twoSetSkill.name: Infinitely Divisible Spacetime 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Increases Total DMG by 35.0%. Lightning DMG from Combo ATK inflicts Butterfly Mark that lasts 15s (triggering it again refreshes the duration). A marked enemy suffers an explosion dealing 100.0% ATK of Lightning DMG every time it takes 4 hits from the host (CD: 1.5s).

threeSetSkill.name: Forever Unreachable Finish 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Butterfly Mark's explosion restores 2 SP additionally. Triggering Ultimate Evasion Skill increases Lightning DMG against enemies with Butterfly Mark by 60.0% for 15s (triggering it again refreshes the duration).
